title: Sunderland v Arsenal: Premier League – live
summary: Mikel Arteta leads his team as the league leaders visit the Stadium of Light. Scott Murray provides minute-by-minute updates on the match. Fans can follow along for real-time developments.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week seven – live
summary: This week's soundtrack features Taylor Swift, Ed Sheeran, and Queen. The spotlight is on who will shine brightly with their performances and who might falter. It promises to be an exciting showdown of musical talents.

title: Chelsea v Wolves: Premier League – live
summary: Enzo Maresca's team is set to face the league's bottom team in an upcoming match. Barry Glendenning will provide minute-by-minute updates throughout the game. Fans can expect live commentary on the action as it unfolds.

title: England v Fiji: Autumn Nations Series rugby union – live
summary: England faces Fiji in the Autumn Nations Series, a rematch from their narrow victory in the World Cup quarter-final two years ago. The match promises excitement as both teams aim to showcase their skills. Join Lee Calvert for live updates and commentary.

title: São Paulo Grand Prix: Lando Norris claims pole position after flying lap – live
summary: Drivers are competing in Brazil for the sprint race, with intense action on track. Following the sprint, they will vie for pole position in the main event. Stay tuned for the latest updates on the races and results.
